titles.title: REP VA Act
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to improve telephone communication by the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
REP VA Act
Representing VA with Accuracy Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
